name: Cozy Cat Cafe Company
description:
Cat barista simulator.

Prepare coffee for you customers according to their order. Be quick and precise for better ratings and tips!

Controls:

WASD - Move

IJKL - Action

TAB - Toggle input rotation from cardinal to diagonal

How to play:

Use the different stations to make coffee:

1 - Coffee Machine - Fill using Coffee Bean Bag

2 - Milk machine - Fill using Milk Box

3 - Toppings station (Sugar, Cream and Cocoa)

Hint:

Be sure to get the coffee beans and milk from the delivery box outside the shop entrance. You won't be able to fill the machines otherwise

Made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022
